duties_responsibilities.duty: Partner with Purchasing/Logistics coordinator & the warehouse staff to record & manage inventory with timely reconciliation.

Coordinate & assist month-end close processes, including but not limited to: Inventory & Cost Accounting, Fixed Asset Accounting, Intercompany transactions and reconciliations, AR & AP Reconciliation, Various month-end financial reports.
Assist Controller in preparing material for periodic JSOX audit, quarterly & annual financial audits, and corporate income tax provision as well annual transfer pricing studies.
Supervise & guide AR and AP staff in day-to-day transaction processing.
Prepare ad-hoc financial reports and analysis as needed & during the annual budgeting cycle.
Help in improving transaction processing on the ERP system to make the system robust.

education_certification.credential: BS in Accounting required. CPA preferred but not required
